QuestData.Title: A Disarming Distraction
QuestData.Description: The curse has taken over the expedition members' higher brain functions, but my calculations reveal their suppressed adolescent subconscious can still be stimulated by realistic imagery.$B$BUtilize this holo-projector to distract them.$B$BThey are currently setting up explosives at the tomb to the east to attempt to gain access to secret passages in Uldum.$B$BThey seek dangerous re-origination technology beneath Uldum and must be stopped.
QuestData.LogDescription: Disarm the First, Second and Third Bomb Clusters and deactivate 4 Unstable Bomb Bots at the Tomb of the Sun King.
QuestData.CompletionText: Greetings, user $n. I am happy to see you are still unaffected by the effects of the expedition curse.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $n. The expedition has already doomed itself.$B$BThere is no need for it to endanger the rest of the world as well.
